title: Receive a Vaccine Reminder
description: While documenting in a pediatric patient's chart, a CDS alert reminds the provider that the patient is due for their MMR vaccine.

tasks.expected_outcome: Provider sees the reminder that a vaccine is due.

tasks.description: Discuss the recommended vaccine with the patient's parent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Provider communicates the recommendation to the guardian.

tasks.description: Place an order for the MMR vaccine, which was prompted by the CDS reminder.
tasks.expected_outcome: Provider orders the vaccine, improving immunization rates and patient care.
